DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine high risk diabetic positive predictive value stress echocardiography superior positive predictive value stress scintigraphy diagnosis coronary stenosis > 50 % .
DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis Coronary Artery Disease High Risk Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison Between Stress Echocardiography Stress Scintigraphy Detection Silent Myocardial Ischemia
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetic patient woman > 60 yo men > 55 yo , high risk coronary artery disease ( EF < 40 % , ECG abnormality , renal failure , 2 others risk factor atherosclerosis ) previous document CAD acute coronary syndrome
